page.title: 12RELIGION2
page.content: {The Rev.Jenkins}is Rector of the Parish Church of St Alkmund.There are 3 services on Sundays and about 70 people attend each week.Church activities include a Men's Society, Mother's Union and Youth Club.{The Rev {Hudson}of St.John's Methodist Church holds 2 services each Sunday and their activities include a Sunday School and Mother and Toddler Group.{Father Brown of St George's Roman Catholic Church has a Sunday attendance of 70.{The Rev {Martin}is minister of the United Reformed Church. A Ladies Guild and Bible Study group meet regularly.The town is also home to the Jehovah's Witnesses and 2 Pentecostal and Evangelical groups.The latter runs a shop in Watergate Street selling religious books.Whitchurch's Council of Churches exists to encourage cooperation between religious groups.
